scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "bun run --cwd packages/server dev" "bun run --cwd packages/client dev"
scripts.dev:test: concurrently --kill-others "bun run --cwd packages/server dev:test" "bun run --cwd packages/client dev:test"

scripts.test: bun run --cwd packages/shared test && bun run --cwd packages/core test && bun run --cwd packages/agent test && bun run --cwd packages/server test && bun run --cwd packages/client test
